description:
'''Rupam Islam''' (born 25 January 1974) is an Indian [[singer-songwriter]], [[music composer]], and [[writer]]. He is the lead [[vocalist]] of the [[Rock music of West Bengal|Bengali rock]] band [[Fossils (band)|Fossils]]. Outside of his rock music work, Islam has also contributed to several [[Cinema of West Bengal|Bengali film]] productions as a [[playback singer]].{{citation needed|date=May 2025}}

In 2010, he won the [[National Film Award for Best Male Playback Singer]] for his performance in the Bengali film [[Mahanagar@Kolkata]]. He is also a member of the Bangla Sangeet Academy, an institution under the [[Government of West Bengal]].
